text: Læa sing thi xyu nı brrda chan fa læa sing thi xyu nı phændin nan pen siththi khx ngxallxhˌ læa thæcring rea di sang seiy wi kæ brrda phu thi di rab khamphir kxn cak phwk cea læa phwk cea dwy wa cng yakerng xallxhˌ theid læa hakwa phwk cea ptiseth sraththa k thæcring sing thi xyu nı brrda chan fa læa sing thi xyu nı phændin nan pen siththi khx ngxallxhˌ læa xallxhˌ pen phuthrng mangmi phuthrng di rab kar srrseriy
